cars.title: Lamborghini
cars.description: Lamborghini is an Italian luxury sports car manufacturer that is renowned for producing high-performance, stylish, and exotic sports cars. The company was founded by Ferruccio Lamborghini in 1963 with the aim of competing with established luxury car brands like Ferrari.

cars.title: Ferrari
cars.description: Ferrari is an iconic Italian luxury sports car manufacturer that has become synonymous with high-performance, precision engineering, and motorsport excellence. Founded by Enzo Ferrari in 1939, the company is renowned for producing some of the most coveted and recognizable sports cars in the world.
